com.orgsync.api

Interface AccountsResource


  • public interface AccountsResource

    Access to the accounts resource from the OrgSync API. This allows a client to get all accounts, get an account by account ID, or search based on other fields. A client can also update an account using updateAccount(int, AccountUpdateRequest) with an AccountUpdateRequest. Finally, access to the custom profile is provided by getCustomProfileFields().

    See: https://api.orgsync.com/api/docs/v2/accounts See: https://orgsync.com/36548/files/496820/show

      • getAccounts

        Get all of the accounts in this community.

        a future to the response with the full account details
